title: New: Sundara Karma – Happy Family
body:
Reading indie four-piece **Sundara Karma** return with the latest track off their forthcoming album YOUTH IS ONLY EVER FUN IN RETROSPECT, _Happy Family._

Opening with a folk heavy guitar intro, the band take inspiration from Fleet Foxes with gorgeous and wistfully echoed vocals. The track takes on a more upbeat tone with the belated addition of booming bass, drums and hand clap percussion, before launching into a grand and euphoric chorus.

From more gentle, rustic folk to arena rock in 6 minutes, Sundara have proved yet again to be more than your average indie/alternative starlets. With a deeper, wider range of sound on display, Happy Family will keep fans very excited going into a what is sure to be a big 2017 for Sundara Karma.
